title: Riot never dose shit too toxic players

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body: And I would certainly hope not. How would they administer it to them for a start? An eye dropper? A spoon? A medicine cup? And what sort of consistency are we talking? I'm all for bans but dosing shit to toxic players is well past the remit of any riot employees looking after player behavior.
